abstract: Swiss Reinsurance Co., the world’s second-largest reinsurer, said it has agreed to repay Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, which injected 3 billion Swiss francs ($3.09 billion) of capital last year.
snippet: Swiss Reinsurance Co., the world’s second-largest reinsurer, said it has agreed to repay Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, which injected 3 billion Swiss francs ($3.09 billion) of capital last year.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss Reinsurance Company, the world’s second-largest reinsurer, said it had agreed to repay the billionaire investor Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway, which injected 3 billion Swiss francs ($3.09 billion) of capital last year, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Swiss Re Repays Buffett’s $3 Billion Loan

abstract: NetJets, the private jet giant owned by Berkshire Hathaway, said on Thursday that it will acquire Marquis Jet, a provider of jet services cards.
snippet: NetJets, the private jet giant owned by Berkshire Hathaway, said on Thursday that it will acquire Marquis Jet, a provider of jet services cards.
lead_paragraph: NetJets, the private jet company owned by Berkshire Hathaway, said on Thursday that it would buy Marquis Jet, which sells flight time on private jets.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway’s NetJets to Buy Marquis Jet
